name: staking_withdraw_action_024
body: token :: burn (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . staking_withdraw_src_024 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"staking_withdraw" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount ,) ? ;
let mut st = & mut ctx . accounts . state ;
st . count = st . count . checked_add (amount) . unwrap_or (st . count) ;

fields.name: staking_withdraw_src_024
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , token :: mint = mint , token :: authority = auth)]

fields.name: auth
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: PDA derived from static seed, vulnerable to sharing"] # [account (seeds = [b"staking_withdraw"] , bump)]
